sentences: Bica studied at the Academia dos Amadores de Musica in Lisbon and the Hochschule für Musik in Würzburg.
He was "Musician of the Year" in Portugal in 1998 and in 2016.
For his album Matéria-Prima released in 2010, the Carlos Paredes Prize 2011 was awarded to Carlos Bica.
For more than twenty years Carlos Bica’s AZUL has fascinated its listeners.
He has played at important jazz festivals across Europe, Canada and Asia.
I Am the Escaped One (Clean Feed, 2019)
Paul Brody, The South Klezmer Suite (Laika, 2003)
Pedro Caldeira Cabral, Pedro Caldeira Cabral (EMI, 1985)
Ulrike Haage, Die Stille Hinter Den Worten (Sans Soleil, 2008)
